display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EJE1zINfxeQQ7kNvwEX4y03&_nc_oc=Adm3kyVpnE3VXXDRJ3goYkejWyyGLcLJHOW-OIMKoZrt3kuG3HHfY-KFYTI64-zEoIk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfkG5AYhZDLGhm8f6c9gapae51pQcMyXsMU2-2aEp2ZZtQ&oe=6950A5AA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PRQXrgylRKwQ7kNvwGgHNnr&_nc_oc=AdmjcMNam2F-0CjP-9aiMl2jsC0yY8ZRahL3EDzPmlcWLdj-9xmAP5dP6datMNxHzWI&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AflhBjzW-8sxYJvvwJU8w0nDE4_5i5VRILvMk3hetzZdgg&oe=69509612)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9ANtQi4u7L8Q7kNvwHZ7usa&_nc_oc=AdnDHjo2eQRdE1bL9U5vsu8iFbjbc7XY4inG4V2GMwebsFF7zzHgLI3-OQXepZD6nvc&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afk9ocIzOcpTOjtQO5i5JGth2pV1Zxhvzk1TvBlPNVCj0A&oe=69509CED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7bblVkiPOiEQ7kNvwH5awqJ&_nc_oc=Adn_Y4TwCOwPhE_zriTLxlfRSYXgRAYEEn_I2nVPeprXiV-hbsnBh5T8YR_uEy17irs&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afm0N-y02ESWIzMBpNgKpwDz5TVewk94FYINLrLDeUELAQ&oe=6950B150)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57566682_1730682357765277_5286327356836676334_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=84jmMJ0Ph7cQ7kNvwFO1Oyy&_nc_oc=AdkJZa_F-ZSWTQlFyvDDlrn1BM9Zd4CBogJj34JHF6YX_xTLDxcD4u0U3QWu1pefY8I&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AflYMSliX-OtHvJqpVrHxbNmaoHKb3kRNw2NkWjYJyYzlA&oe=6950A5A3)
